resources.string:
Login Password: Please enter the Login Password that has been sent through SMS to your mobile inbox by your bank for mobile banking services

New Password: Please enter your custom Login Password

Confirm New Password: Please re-enter your custom Login Password.

Login: To log into the application

Products: To access bank schemes, services, and financial products

Refer a Friend: To refer a friend about availing the mobile banking services

Locator: To search for the bank’s ATM or branch address

Feedback: To send your feedback on the services provided and view the current status of your feedback

Transfer: To perform banking services such as Fund Transfer

Accounts: To perform banking services such as Balance Enquiry, Mini Statement and Transaction History

Deposit: TMB Offers wide range of Deposit Schemes. Open your preferred Deposit Schemes here

Payments: To perform payments for utility bills and Donations

IMPS: To transfer funds to other account(s) using Immediate Payment Service

Requests: To perform banking services such as request To Bank

Recharge: To recharge your prepaid Mobile /DTH /Data Card.

Settings: To customize your mobile banking application

Change mPIN: To change your mPIN

Messages: To view acknowledged messages of each transaction

Login Password: Please enter the Login Password that has been sent through SMS to your mobile inbox by your bank for mobile banking services

New Password: Please enter your custom Login Password

Confirm New Password: Please re-enter your custom Login Password.

Login Password: Please enter the Login Password that has been sent through SMS to your mobile inbox by your bank for mobile banking services

New Password: Please enter your custom Login Password

Confirm New Password: Please re-enter your custom Login Password.

mPIN: Please enter the mPIN that has been sent through SMS to your mobile inbox by your bank for mobile banking services

New mPIN: Please enter your custom mPIN

Confirm New mPIN: Please re-enter your custom mPIN

mPIN: Please enter the mPIN that has been sent through SMS to your mobile inbox by your bank for mobile banking services

New mPIN: Please enter your custom mPIN

Confirm New mPIN: Please re-enter your custom mPIN

GPRS: Helps you to make transactions using internet. This is the preferred mode to make fast transactions.

SMS: Helps you to make transactions using SMS (SMS usage is charged as per the applicable rates).

GPRS: Helps you to make transactions using internet. This is the preferred mode to make fast transactions.

SMS: Helps you to make transactions using SMS (SMS usage is charged as per the applicable rates).

Balance Enquiry: To enquire about your account(s) balance

Mini Statement: To view your last few transactions

Deposit Account Balance: To enquire about your deposit account balance

Loan Balance: To enquire about your loan balance

Transaction History: To view recent done transactions

Inward Cheque Status: To check the current status of the inward cheque

Outward Cheque Status: To check the current status of the outward cheque

Fund Transfer - To Mobile No.: To transfer funds using beneficiary’s Mobile number through IMPS

Fund Transfer - To Account No.: To transfer funds using beneficiary’s Account number through IMPS

Fund Transfer - To AADHAAR No.: To transfer funds using beneficiary’s AADHAAR number through IMPS

IMPS Merchant Payment: To transfer funds using Merchant’s Mobile number through IMPS

Generate OTP (One Time Password): To generate OTP for authenticating the merchant payments using IMPS

Generate MMID (Mobile Money Identifier): To generate MMID for availing the IMPS facility

Retrieve MMID (Mobile Money Identifier): To know your Mobile Money Identifier

Cancel MMID (Mobile Money Identifier): To cancel your Mobile Money Identifier

My Own Accounts: To transfer funds to your own account in the same branch/bank

Within TMB: To transfer funds to the accounts within the same bank

Other Bank: To transfer funds to other bank accounts

Open Recurring Deposit: To open Recurring Deposit

Open Fixed Deposit (Simple Interest): To open Fixed Deposit

Open Navarathnamala Deposit: To open Navarathnamala Deposit

Open Muthukuvial Deposit: To open Muthukuvial Deposit

Special 20:20 Deposit: To open Special 20:20 Deposit

Special 555 Deposit: To open Special 555 Deposit

Mobile-to-Mobile: To transfer funds using beneficiary mobile number

Mobile-to-Account: To transfer funds using beneficiary’s account number
NEFT: To transfer funds to other bank accounts using National Electronic Fund Transfer (NEFT)

Registered Bill Payment: To register different billers and make payments. In this payment mode, you can view the bill and make the payment.

Instant Bill Payment: To pay utility bills without registering a biller. This option is provided by certain billers only.

Bill Pay: To pay utility bills.

Donation: To donate funds to religious Institutions/charities/trusts/etc.

Fees Payment: To pay tution/hostel fees.

Stop Cheque: To stop a cheque from payment

Cheque Status: To check the current status of the issued cheque

Card Hotlist: To block your debit card instantly

Booking & Payment: To book and pay for the Airline Tickets

Payment Only: To make payment for the tickets booked through call centres and other ticketing vendors

Reprint Ticket: To reprint the booked airline ticket

Account Fetch: To fetch all the accounts linked with your mobile number

Save Message in Inbox: To enable/disable to save the transaction acknowledgement messages in the application’s Inbox

Change Login Password: To change the Login Password

Contact Us: Get in touch with us for any Queries, Feedback or Grievances

Configure/Update E-Mail ID: To configure or update the E-mail ID to record transactions

For Queries/Feedback or any Grievances, please mail us to mobile_banking@tmbank.in

In case you still have a query, please feel free to Call us in 044-26194684/85, 044-26223115

Hotlist Debit Card: To block your debit card instantly

Cheque Status: To check the current status of the issued cheque

Stop Cheque: To stop a cheque from payment

Cheque Book: Place a New Cheque Book request here. Your Cheque book will be dispatched to your mailing address

Debit Card: Place a New ATM/Debit card request here. Your Card will be dispatched to your mailing address

Credit Card: Request for New Credit Card here. Our Bank personal will contact you

eConnect SignOn password: Forgot your eConnect SignOn password? Place a Request here. Your Password will be dispatched to your mailing address

eConnect Transaction Password: Forgot your eConnect Transaction Password? Place a Request here. Your Password will be dispatched to your mailing address

Debit Card PIN: Forgot your ATM/Debit Card Pin? Place a Request here. Your Pin will be dispatched to your mailing address

Loan: TMB offers you loans based on your requirements and fulfill your dreams! Place a Request here for your branch person to contact you
